gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nuggets 111, Hornets 93
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nuggets defeated the Hornets, 111-93. Jamal Murray recorded 25 points, seven assists, and five 3PM for the Nuggets, while Michael Porter Jr. added 22 points, eight rebounds, and four 3PM in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 26 points, nine rebounds, and five assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Nuggets improve to 24-11 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 7-24.
